title: D or F: What's your flash key, and why?
body:
For me, I put {{summoner:4}} on F because I played without it until {{champion:203}}'s launch, since I didn't try using it ever. However, jungling was my favorite role, and always put {{summoner:11}} on D since I'd very rarely swap off of {{summoner:7}} (which is put on F when you first make your account). D has always been my {{summoner:11}} key, so as a result, F ended up becoming my {{summoner:4}} key.

What key do you put _your_ flash on, and do you have any reason why you picked that key?

replies.body: D and I absolutely never change it. Been using it like this since I started playing the game around 5 years ago

D

It's faster than F.

I  respectfully disagree, but it's likely purely based on how I position my fingers.
5th through second digit  (so all fingers minus thumb) lay on QWER respectively, with F right below my first digit. It takes longer for me to brush against and push my third digit out of the way a tad to get to D than it does to go straight down to F
It really depends on your hand positioning. I only use 3 fingers for abilities, so D is easier to access.
i disagree, u only use 3 and i prefer F over D
why not just use standard typing position of asdf so that you have your fingers readily available for both summs and just flick them upward for spellcasting

Because that's highly inefficient.
Instead of occasionally moving a single finger down I have to constantly move 4 fingers upward

they seem about the same really and holding your hand that far up on the keyboard seems more likely for symptoms of carporel tunnel or however it's spelled for wrist problems

it's also easier to slide up than it is to slide down, that's why the uncommon letters and symbols are below in the standard typing format

I have it on f. The reason for that is having the f key being the farther of the two, it taught me not to panic smack the key when there were situations I couldn’t think my way out of instead of using flash.

Plus when I do need it last second my brain can easily think press f for flash.

d= ignite
f= smite

Shaco One trick forever
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GXzqTZ-bUAs
What the heck did I just watch? I mean it was hilarious and I liked it, but what the heck? lol. :D

I expected it to use the logic of d is for dignite, dexhaust, dteleport, dheal, dbarrier, dcleanse, dghost, dclarity, and dsmite.

I was dissapointed

I put it on D because it's naturally where my index finger is, so I can click it as fast as possible. Every other summoner for me requires a bit more deliberation (usually heal or ignite) and I can hover down to F for that. Flash needs that split second reaction timing, both for offense and defense, and that 0.1 seconds it takes for my finger to move half an inch could mean life or death, or kill/no kill.

D for death
F for Flash

D is for dash, which rhymes with Flash. 

F is for fire {{summoner:14}}

F is for Flash.

D is for dIgnite, dGhost, dTeleport, detc.

D is for Flash, because you must always flash the D. 

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

F for flash
D for don't put flash here
{{summoner:4}} on D because you need the key to be closer to your finger for faster reaction time being agressive or defensive flash.
flash is for noobs!
I have on D because I started playing like this from the beginning.
I put summs on the side mouse buttons. Upper one for flash.

> [{quoted}](name=Pete Ieffo,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=JHLpgPkJ,comment-id=001f,timestamp=2018-09-09T22:20:10.651+0000)
>
> I put summs on the side mouse buttons. Upper one for flash.

i tried that but i just end up using it by accident
probably also depends on if you play with 4 or 3 fingers
D F does it matter?

Of course it matters!
Flash begins with F so it goes on F
Dbarrier, dclarity, dcleanse, dexhaust, dghost, dheal, dignite, dsmite, and dteleport all start with D so they go on D

> [{quoted}](name=Farahad,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=JHLpgPkJ,comment-id=00100000,timestamp=2018-09-10T01:23:22.747+0000)
>
> Of course it matters!
> Flash begins with F so it goes on F
> Dbarrier, dclarity, dcleanse, dexhaust, dghost, dheal, dignite, dsmite, and dteleport all start with D so they go on D

I think you didn't see the pun.

F for flash
D for definitely anything but flash.

D because I have the force of habit of my fingers on the WAD buttons (shooter games), as well as D being faster in that respect.  Once you get the habit of not panic flashing, using it quickly is more important and not costly.  Also applies to Ult (R) being a tactical decision that takes longer than putting my finger on it (with most champs I use anyways).
my summoner spells are bound to F1 and F2. i do that so my W and my E can reach them without too much trouble.
Flash goes on F and only F. People that put it on D have flat-earth level insanity.
pretty sure everyone likes flashing at random when they try to hit the ping key...

> [{quoted}](name=MF all lanes,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=JHLpgPkJ,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2018-09-09T16:47:28.659+0000)
>
> Flash goes on F and only F. People that put it on D have flat-earth level insanity.

Your logic is flawed. Just because F is a aummoner binding 8t doesn't mean it stands for Flash lol, that's your assumption.

mine's always the D key.  it's too easy to flash accidentally when you're trying to hit a ping key

though flash is not one my favorite summoner spells anyway

I put Smite on D whenever I jungled but the rest of the time I would put Flash on D and my other summoner spell on F.
I finally forced myself to put Smite on F and Flash on D to keep myself from fail-flashing when jungling or accidentally teleporting to the tower next to me when trying to flash away from a gank.
F. Not because F is for flash but because its the most valuable summoner spell, and the key is right below my ult key
x, I use wasd for camera controls and I have abilities maped to my mouse. I also have actives mapped to  zxcvb and e.
D because if I end up panicking im more likely to hit my flash key. I like the summoner I can rely on to be closest to me.
On D because it is easier to reach and I try to only flash when I absolutely need to.
D is flash and G Ignite if I put F on ignite i sometimes missclick
D. In most games I usually don't have ti extend to my F key except as an auxiliary chat key. D feels comfy for me and F is for everything else I will seldom use.

D is for 'D'flash', F is 'For Everything else'.

Honestly, it's the setup I chose and it's stayed that way. My first game of Blitz, it set it the other way around when I was assigned jungle, I flashed early not realising.

Flash on D cuz flash on f is for losers. 

There's only one exception and that's singed in aram, cuz ghost on D takes priority over Flash on D and snowball is thrash so flash becomes a "regular" summoner that isn't mandatory and thus is allowed on the F key.

Mine flash is on F in lane and D in jungle. 

I do this because I'm color blind, so smite and flash look like the same thing, icon wise.

I play with all 5 fingers. 

My thumb is responsible for the spacebar key, and the D + F key. 

I put flash on D because it's almost impossible for me to accidentally flash without reaching for it. F however is just close enough for my thumb to touch first increasing my chances of accidentally clicking it when I do go for the D key.
